text:
Andrea Donnellan is a principal investigator at the Jet Propulsion Laboratory. She is an editor of the "Earth and Space Science" journal. She studies earthquakes using geodetic imaging.
Life.
She studied at Ohio State University, University of Southern California, and California Institute of Technology. From 1998 to 2015, she taught at the University of Southern California. She teaches at California State Polytechnic University, Pomona.
